thumb.title: 歌のタイトル [original song, Vocaloid, Brian/Jessica]
thumb.description: I've been thinking about the title being at the core of a song: it conveys the theme and lands in the chorus; gives the framework for the lyrics to be built around. This song refused to do any of this, so I went contrary, down an opaque avenue instead, including the Title in Japanese, which may make more sense on NND ironically. Such are the vagaries of the Muse.
